title: 87/579/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 November 1987 approving an addendum to the floriculture sector programme notified by the Greek Goverment under Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 November 1987
approving an addendum to the floriculture sector programme notified by the Greek Goverment under Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(87/579/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The addendum to the programme on the marketing of non-edible horticultural products notified on 22 April 1985 by the Greek Government under Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, further information on which was provided on 1 April 1987, is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done in Brussels, 30 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 110, 23. 4. 1982, p. 24.
